Rice ½ kg 

Oil ¾ cup 

Brown onion 1 cup 

Mutton 750 gm 

Yogurt 1 cup 

Ginger garlic 2 tbsp 

Coriander powder 2 tsp 

Chili powder 3 tsp 

Turmeric ½ tsp 

Allspice 1 tsp heaped 

Salt 1 ½ tsp 

Green cardamom grinded ½ tsp 

Potatoes 4 cut and fried till golden 

Tomatoes 4 sliced 

Green chilies whole 8 

Dried plums 10 

Coriander leaves ½ cup chopped 

Mint 20 leaves

1. Boil rice with salt until ¾ done. 

2. Heat oil add half brown onion, mutton, ginger garlic paste, fry for 10 minutes 

3. Add yogurt with all dry spices, cover and cook for 15 minutes add 1 ½ cup water, again cover and cook till mutton done. 

4. Add in it boiled potatoes, sliced tomatoes, green chilies, dried plums, again cover and cook for 10 to 15 minutes. 

5. Lastly add coriander, mint, remaining brown onion, top with boiled rice, add yellow color, mixed with Kewra and ½ cup milk. 

6. Leave it on dum until done.
